defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of thirty-five Special Reports on Labor and Employment Management by J.D. Hackett, October 1919.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: J. D. Hacket "Hotel Investigation: Special Reports on Labor and Employment Management" #5958m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6034: Rare Pamphlet Collection 6395: Charles D. Wrege Research Papers

did.unittitle: Hotel Investigation: Special Reports on Labor and Employment Management

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Reports include: Employment office door notice; Food: notice in lunch rooms; Labor supply: "ad" book; Labor supply: "ad" character; Recommendations: revision; Cause of Leaving tabulation; Wage change form; Turnover: chambermaids; Rules; Transfers form; Employment bibliography; Employment Department daily report; Employment manager's duties; References: notice; Requisition for help; Centralized employment memo; Hiring and training cost; Employment records; Labor policy: executives; Hotel Association memo; Census of department: occupation; Labor policy: general; Discharge regulation; Sanitary regulation; Treatment of employees; Labor supply; Wage payments, weekly; Organization chart: E.O.; Publicity; Food complaints; Occupational list; Advertisements: analysis; Welfare work; Turnover: statistics; Recommendation form
